title: T-Mobile CEO John Legere chimes in on AT&T customer service scandal
text:
T-Mobile CEO John Legere chimes in on AT&T customer service scandal 
Published By: AndroidAuthority.com - Today 
AT&T was on the spotlight today, and you can be sure T-Mobile CEO John Legere didn't let that opportunity go to waste. He had his fair share...
